description: Weather data including Temperature, Pressure, Humidity for a particular place and a particular sensor ie Place = Baanfalang and sensor = Office01

panels.description: Latest temperature reading from selected device

targets.query:
from(bucket: "Weather")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Readings")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_type"] == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["site_name"] == "${site_name}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_id"] =~ /^(${device_id:regex})$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temperature")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "current_temperature")

panels.title: Current Temperature

panels.description: Temperature readings from selected weather devices

targets.query:
from(bucket: "Weather")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Readings")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_type"] == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["site_name"] == "${site_name}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_id"] =~ /^(${device_id:regex})$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temperature")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "temperature")

panels.title: Temperature over time

panels.description:
Latest wind speed reading from selected device.

**Wind Speed Reference Table**

| Wind Speed (knots) | Description         | Sailor’s Term                | Typical Action                                                      |
|--------------------|---------------------|------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------|
| 0–3                | Calm                | Drifter                      | Often no steerage way under sail; may need engine                    |
| 4–8                | Light breeze        | Gentle/Drifting              | Light air sails or genoa; slow but pleasant                         |
| 9–14               | Moderate breeze     | Pleasant Sailing             | Ideal cruising; full sails up                                       |
| 15–20              | Fresh breeze        | Lively                       | Reef main or reduce headsail if needed                              |
| 21–25              | Strong breeze       | Challenging                  | One or more reefs, skilled handling                                 |
| 26–33              | Near gale           | Rough/Heavy Weather          | Deep reefs, storm tactics, skilled crew essential                   |
| 34–47              | Gale to strong gale | Storm/Cyclonic Conditions    | Storm sails, heaving-to, possibly unsafe                            |

Note: This table is for reference only. Always use your best judgment and consider local conditions.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "Weather")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Readings")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_type"] == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["site_name"] == "${site_name}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_id"] =~ /^(${device_id:regex})$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "wind_speed_instantaneous")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * 1.94384 }))
  |> yield(name: "current_wind_speed_knots")

panels.title: Current Wind Speed

panels.description:
Wind speed readings from selected weather devices including instantaneous, average, and gust measurements.

**Wind Speed Reference Table**

| Wind Speed (knots) | Description         | Sailor’s Term                | Typical Action                                                      |
|--------------------|---------------------|------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------|
| 0–3                | Calm                | Drifter                      | Often no steerage way under sail; may need engine                    |
| 4–8                | Light breeze        | Gentle/Drifting              | Light air sails or genoa; slow but pleasant                         |
| 9–14               | Moderate breeze     | Pleasant Sailing             | Ideal cruising; full sails up                                       |
| 15–20              | Fresh breeze        | Lively                       | Reef main or reduce headsail if needed                              |
| 21–25              | Strong breeze       | Challenging                  | One or more reefs, skilled handling                                 |
| 26–33              | Near gale           | Rough/Heavy Weather          | Deep reefs, storm tactics, skilled crew essential                   |
| 34–47              | Gale to strong gale | Storm/Cyclonic Conditions    | Storm sails, heaving-to, possibly unsafe                            |

Note: This table is for reference only. Always use your best judgment and consider local conditions.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "Weather")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Readings")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_type"] == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["site_name"] == "${site_name}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_id"] =~ /^(${device_id:regex})$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "wind_speed_instantaneous")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * 1.94384 }))
  |> yield(name: "wind_speed_instantaneous_knots")

from(bucket: "Weather")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Readings")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_type"] == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["site_name"] == "${site_name}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_id"] =~ /^(${device_id:regex})$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "wind_speed_average")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * 1.94384 }))
  |> yield(name: "wind_speed_average_knots")

from(bucket: "Weather")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Readings")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_type"] == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["site_name"] == "${site_name}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_id"] =~ /^(${device_id:regex})$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "wind_gust")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * 1.94384 }))
  |> yield(name: "wind_gust_knots")

panels.title: Wind Speed Over Time

panels.description: Raw wind sensor readings and diagnostic information

targets.query:
from(bucket: "Weather")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Readings")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_type"] == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["site_name"] == "${site_name}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_id"] =~ /^(${device_id:regex})$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "wind_raw_reading")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "wind_raw_reading")

panels.title: Wind Sensor Raw Reading

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.tagValues(
    bucket: "Weather",
    tag: "site_name",
    predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "Readings" and r.device_type == "weather"
)
list.label: Site Name
list.name: site_name

query.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.tagValues(
    bucket: "Weather",
    tag: "site_name",
    predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "Readings" and r.device_type == "weather"
)

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.tagValues(
    bucket: "Weather",
    tag: "device_id",
    predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "Readings" and r.device_type == "weather" and r.site_name == "${site_name}"
)
list.label: Device ID
list.name: device_id
